languages.text: "Шаттлы с добычей уже направляются к флагману для выгрузки и описи. Но что прикажете делать с самой станцией? Смею заметить, что она — более ценный актив, чем вывезенные товары".
languages.translation_comment:
если не стартован HeriokhsRim_Macrocannons — выдаем MacroLightDLC1
если не стартован HeriokhsRim_Engine — выдаем DriveDLC1
Выдаем ПФ прилично

если не стартован HeriokhsRim_Macrocannons — выдаем MacroLightDLC1
если не стартован HeriokhsRim_Engine — выдаем DriveDLC1
Выдаем ПФ прилично

languages.text: "The shuttles with trophies are already on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."
languages.original_text: "Шаттлы с добычей уже направляются к флагману для выгрузки и описи. Но что прикажете делать с самой станцией? Смею заметить, что она — более ценный актив, чем вывезенные товары".

traits.locale_text: "The trophy shuttles are on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."
"The trophy shuttles are on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."
"The trophy shuttles are on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."

"The shuttles with trophies are already on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."

"The shuttles with trophies are already on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."

languages.text: "Die Shuttles mit Trophäen sind bereits unterwegs zum Flaggschiff, wo sie entladen und inventarisiert werden. Aber was ist mit der Station selbst? Ich wage zu behaupten, dass sie wertvoller wäre, als die geborgenen Waren."
languages.original_text: "The shuttles with trophies are already on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."

traits.locale_text: "Die Shuttles mit Trophäen sind bereits unterwegs zum Flaggschiff, wo sie entladen und inventarisiert werden. Aber was ist mit der Station selbst? Ich wage zu behaupten, dass sie wertvoller wäre, als die geborgenen Waren."

languages.text: « Les navettes transportant le butin sont déjà en chemin vers le vaisseau amiral où elles déchargeront leur cargaison pour inventaire. Reste à décider du sort de la station elle-même... Si vous voulez mon avis, elle est plus précieuse que tout le matériel récupéré sur place. »
languages.original_text: "The shuttles with trophies are already on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."

traits.locale_text: « Les navettes transportant le butin sont déjà en chemin vers le vaisseau amiral où elles déchargeront leur cargaison pour inventaire. Reste à décider du sort de la station elle-même... Si vous voulez mon avis, elle est plus précieuse que tout le matériel récupéré sur place. »

languages.text: «Las lanzaderas ya vienen de regreso a la nave insignia cargadas de trofeos para inventariarlos. ¿Pero qué hay de la propia estación? Me atrevería a decir que se trata de un recurso aún más valioso que los lujos que hemos recuperado de ella».
languages.original_text: "The shuttles with trophies are already on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."

traits.locale_text: «Las lanzaderas ya vienen de regreso a la nave insignia cargadas de trofeos para inventariarlos. ¿Pero qué hay de la propia estación? Me atrevería a decir que se trata de un recurso aún más valioso que los lujos que hemos recuperado de ella».

languages.text: 「戦利品を積んだシャトルは、すでに荷下ろしと棚卸しのために旗艦に向かっています。ですが、ステーションそのものはどうします？回収した物資よりも価値のある資産だと思いますが」
languages.original_text: "The shuttles with trophies are already on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."

traits.locale_text: 「戦利品を積んだシャトルは、すでに荷下ろしと棚卸しのために旗艦に向かっています。ですが、ステーションそのものはどうします？回収した物資よりも価値のある資産だと思いますが」

languages.text: “穿梭机已经装满了战利品，即将返回旗舰，清点货物。不过这座星站本身该如何处置呢？我敢肯定，它比搜刮来的战利品更有价值。”
languages.original_text: "The shuttles with trophies are already on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."

traits.locale_text: “穿梭机已经装满了战利品，即将返回旗舰，清点货物。不过这座星站本身该如何处置呢？我敢肯定，它比搜刮来的战利品更有价值。”

languages.text: "Ganimet taşıyan mekikler, yük boşaltıp envanter sayımı yapmak için rotalarını hâlihazırda sancak gemisine çevirdi. Peki istasyon ne olacak? Onun ele geçirdiğimiz ürünlerden çok daha kıymetli olduğunu söylesem yeridir."
languages.original_text: "The shuttles with trophies are already on their way to the flagship for unloading and inventorisation. But what about the station itself? I daresay it is a more valuable asset than the recovered commodities."
